title: Celebration
desc: Media magnate Logan Roy shocks his family with a stunning announcement on his 80th birthday. The news shatters his son Kendall, the heir apparent who's in the midst of negotiating the purchase of digital-media venture.

title: Shit Show at the Fuck Factory
desc: While Logan is in the hospital, tensions rise when backup plans should be made by the family.

title: Lifeboats
desc: As their first act as CEO and COO, Ken and Roman try to dig the company out of a financial mess. Meanwhile, Marcia prevents the family from seeing the recovering Roy.

title: Sad Sack Wasp Trap
desc: The family attends an annual company gala overseen by Connor and highlighted by a surprise announcement.

title: I Went to Market
desc: Kendall begins to plot a vote of no confidence against Logan; Tom questions his prenup.

title: Which Side Are You On?
desc: Roman and Kendall attempt to sway the board, while Shiv explores her options in D.C.

title: Austerlitz
desc: The Roys gather for a family therapy session; Kendall finds his sobriety tested.

title: Prague
desc: Tom has a bachelor's party to remember; Kendall and Roman eye new business opportunities.

title: Pre-Nuptial
desc: The Roys assemble at an English castle for Shiv and Tom's wedding; Kendall's plans are fast-tracked.

title: Nobody Is Ever Missing
desc: Roman faces technical difficulties. Tom marks his territory. Kendall hits rock bottom with tragic consequences.

title: The Summer Palace
desc: Still addled from the events in England, Kendall tries to make amends with his dad; Logan receives some unvarnished advice from his financial banker; Tom maneuvers for a new position in the company.

title: Vaulter
desc: Roman and Kendall do a "routine health check" of a new media brand to help Vaulter determine the future of the company; Tom tasks Greg with sniffing out waste at ATN; Connor and Willa host a soiree to mark their return to New York.

title: Hunting
desc: Logan informs his skeptical management team of his plan to make another attempt to acquire Pierce; Greg worries his pre-meeting will puts his standing with the family at risk; Connor's presidential announcement irritates Logan.

title: Safe Room
desc: Roman begins a six-week management training program in the Parks division; Logan and Kendall arrange a covert meeting with a PGM CEO as a controversy surrounding a star anchor leads to a day of chaos at ATN headquarters.

title: Tern Haven
desc: Shiv, Roman and Connor veer from their roles at a weekend retreat to woo the Pierces.

title: Argestes
desc: Logan's deal with the Pierces is threatened; Kendall, Shiv and Roman differ on damage control strategies.

title: Return
desc: A trip to the UK finds the Roy kids negotiating with their mother; Logan turns to Rhea for advice.

title: Dundee
desc: The entire Roy clan travels to Logan's hometown of Dundee, Scotland, for a celebration of Logan's 50 years in the business; Kendall becomes enamored with Jennifer, an actress in Willa's play; a former employee proves difficult to silence.

title: DC
desc: Logan, Kendall, Gerri and Tom testify before Congress; Shiv speaks candidly to Kira, a victim who is set to be a key witness; in Turkey, Roman's business pitch takes a chilling turn.

title: This Is Not for Tears
desc: Logan looks for a sacrificial lamb among his closest allies as the future of the company hangs in the balance.

title: Secession
desc: Following his bombshell presser, a righteous Kendall scrambles to find a base of operations, while Logan's team searches for safe harbor.

title: Mass in Time of War
desc: Kendall tries to get his siblings, as well as Stewy and Sandi on his side. Fearing his legal situation, Greg asks Ewan for help.

title: The Disruption
desc: With the DOJ at the door, Logan summons his arsenal, while Tom makes a potentially life changing offer. Kendall becomes obsessed with his own takedown.

title: Lion in the Meadow
desc: Logan and Kendall have their first meeting together with Josh, a major investor worried about their family feud.

title: Retired Janitors of Idaho
desc: Kendall and the Waystar team find themselves working together at the annual shareholders' meeting, where Logan's health takes a turn.

title: What It Takes
desc: Logan and team head to Virginia for a conservative political conference, where Roman finds out surprising news about his mother.

title: Too Much Birthday
desc: At Kendall's lavish birthday bash, Shiv and Roman try to arrange a meeting with Lukas Matsson, a tech mogul who recently snubbed Logan.

title: Chiantishire
desc: After a tense board meeting to discuss acquisition of Matsson's GoJo, Roman shares his suspicions about their mother's new beau with Shiv. As a luxe family wedding gets underway in Italy, Gerri draws a line in the sand with Roman, the Waystar team grows increasingly concerned about Matsson's rogue tweets, and Shiv and Caroline have a heart-to-heart, of sorts.

title: All the Bells Say
desc: Matsson's vision for the business leads Shiv and Roman to manage the fallout, while Logan weighs his options.
